column2: ENGLISH
I have a fun game I can play together with my friends - hit the pointy-eared freak.
It's fun!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] with some other children have been bullying an elf child.
Non-humans deserve no pity.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should not bully someone because he looks different.
My [GetFromRelation] said I shouldn't bully non-humans.
Oh, well.
Some of my friends look different than me.
It's funny to play with them.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been seen playing with some non-human children.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can play with whom [From.GetSheHe] wants.
Humans should not mingle with lesser races.
My [GetFromRelation] forbade me from playing with non-humans.
Who will I play with now.
A courtier asked me to resolve his quarrel with a servant - an elf. The dispute was a trivial matter and the elf was right no matter how you look at it.
No elf should speak against his betters!
It's obvious that the servant is right.
It seems I myself am not sure on my stance on non-humans. I should decide it once on for all.
They are my equals.
They are lessser beings.
I have been around human too much lately, they must have poisoned my mind, - I have seen my own kind with human like prejudices.
What have I been doing.
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] has been complaining to me that my leniency toward non-humans goes against the teachings of the Eternal Fire.
I will correct myself.
I have been contemplating the teaching of Eternal Fire and have reached a truth non-humans are blight upon this world.
Indeed.
